::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::

Zardus opens his mouth to say something, his wrist comp interrupting him with 
shrill beeps. He frowns, looking at the screen to read the report on damage 
in the lab.

Zardus' eyes widen. The femm!

"Slag," Zardus says, turning to Reptilica, "I gotta take care of something in 
the lab. Fly out to the Pred cave, if the attack has ceased, detour to Grid 
16, there are two Maximals you can pick up there. Its only 30 clicks away 
from here, so carry them back."

He turns to walk toward the Alliance base, "As soon as I get this over with, 
I'll join you."

With that he walks into the Alliance base, heading quickly for the lab.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica nods at his orders, turning to the rest of the group (DevilDuer, 
Bloodystrike, Inzola, Stranato, Burning Hammer, and any other bots outside 
the base).

"You heard 'im! Let's move out."

He activates his jetpack, flying out, slowly so that the rest could keep up. 
DevilDuer and Bloodystrike follow, pausing to let the other bots catch up.
